sentences.sContent: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
...it is difficult to commit themselves to study...
...forecasting's become a very hazardous business so I don't want to commit myself too much...
...the shortage of young adults is likely to make countries more reluctant to commit the few they have to military service...
...Countries that have a shortage of young adults will be less willing to commit them to them to...

synos.tran: 犯罪，做错事；把...交托给；指派…作战；使…承担义务

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ mit(送出) → 一起送出 → 把…托付给

words.tran: 坚定的；效忠的；承担义务的
承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身
委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状
理事；委员；行政长官；总裁
委托；承担义务；赞助；收监；献身（等于commitment）
承诺；委托；干坏事；付诸（commit的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
trans.tranOther: to do something wrong or illegal
